summary:
Professional IT Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing
and leading innovative projects. Proficient in Java, Python, and full-stack
development. Successfully managed multiple projects from conception to
completion. Self-taught, detail-oriented, and dedicated to continuous
learning.
whatido_summary: I'm a software engineer specialised in frontend, backend and mobile development for complex scalable web apps. I write about software development, programming and other miscellaneous tech things on my blog. Want to know how I may help your project? Check out my project portfolio and online resume.
resume_summary: IT Engineer with over a decade of experience leading and designing innovative projects. Specialized in Java, Python, and full-stack development, with a proven track record of end-to-end project management from conception to delivery. A proactive, detail-oriented professional committed to continuous growth and excellence.
summary_porfolio: Welcome to my online portfolio. Here, you'll find a selection of my personal projects and company projects that I am permitted to share. I'm currently adapting some of these projects to work with various frameworks.
summary_videotutorials:
Welcome! In this section, you’ll find video tutorials and ideas. I'm working on adding more content — stay tuned for updates!
NOTE: the videos are in Spanish, but i will add additional information in English
